text: Cocktail is a 1988 American romantic comedy-drama movie directed by Roger Donaldson and written by Heywood Gould. The movie is about a young New York City business student, Brian Flanagan, becomes a bartender in order to pay for his education. The movie stars Tom Cruise, Bryan Brown and Elisabeth Shue. ==References== Category:1988 romantic comedy movies Category:1988 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American buddy comedy movies Category:1980s buddy movies Category:Movies about suicide Category:Movies directed by Roger Donaldson Category:Disney movies Category:Movies about social class Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in Jamaica
title: Cocktail (1988 movie)
